adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S #7b, New York, NY 10019-1628, USA

originalText.text: I came into Dr. Golombeck's office last minute for a tooth that had to be removed.  He was so incredibly helpful and extremely thorough in helping me understand what my options were for my tooth after extraction. He swiftly contacted his top recommendation and we were able to schedule an extraction the next day on that doctor's day off! Unbelievable! Feel so fortunate to have met Dr. Golombeck and look forward to working with him for my crown. If you’re looking for a dental office that makes you feel comfortable and warm, highly recommend! :)

originalText.text: My wife and I both have Dr Golombeck as our dentist.  After I retired and was not spending as much time in NYC I tried other dentists.  I now realize I would rather make the trip into the city to see him.  He is the best and can make a temporary crown that feels like it is the original tooth.  He also has a group of specialists that are the best in class and can get you in for appointments quickly if needed.

originalText.text:
Best dentist and staff !!! Dr golombeck is amazing .It happens to be  that I went to see other  dentists before I went to Dr. Golombeck about my case.None of them saw hope for my compromised two  molars    Amazingly Dr.Golombeck was able to solve my problems where nobody  else felt there was hope. My crowns feel totally like my regular teeth.When I look in the mirror I can’t even tell which teeth are my real teeth and which teeth are the crowns. If you have a difficult situation  he is the dentist to use. If you don’t have a difficult situation he could probably treat you with his eyes closed in addition to his work his office is very neat and  calming , Dr Golombeck  and his staff makes you feel at home

thank you Dr. Golombeck !

originalText.text: The staff here is friendly and outgoing and takes the 'scare' out of going to the dentist. Dr. Golombeck himself is a true professional. Does an excellent job, explains what he's doing, and even adds a few chuckles from time to time.

originalText.text: I have gone to Dr. Golombeck for...decades for EVerything dental you can think of. He is the best Dentist I gave ever been to. (I have tried others before him). A resource in NY. Almost AS IMPORTANT, since i have to get frequent cleanings now—his Dental Hygienist, Amparo is soo good!!
